title: Install on GCP
content:
This section describes how to install the suite on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE).

Before you begin, ensure that you've reviewed the following planning topics for the GCP deployment:

  • The overall reference architecture.
  • The support matrix.
  • The definition of suite size and the required hardware resources.
  • The most frequently asked questions.

For information on preparation, installation, and setup tasks to deploy the suite, see Deploy the suite on GCP
